Type Alias# NSTextInputSourceIdentifier

```
typealias NSTextInputSourceIdentifier = String
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSTextInputSourceIdentifier#see-also)

### [Handling Input Sources](/documentation/AppKit/NSTextInputSourceIdentifier#Handling-Input-Sources)

[`func handleEvent(NSEvent) -> Bool`](/documentation/appkit/nstextinputcontext/handleevent(_:))Tells the Cocoa text input system to handle mouse or key events.[`func discardMarkedText()`](/documentation/appkit/nstextinputcontext/discardmarkedtext())Tells the Cocoa text input system to discard the current conversion session.[`func invalidateCharacterCoordinates()`](/documentation/appkit/nstextinputcontext/invalidatecharactercoordinates())Notifies the Cocoa text input system that the position information previously queried via methods like `firstRectForCharacterRange:actualRange:` needs to be updated.[`var keyboardInputSources: [NSTextInputSourceIdentifier]?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextinputcontext/keyboardinputsources)The array of keyboard text input source identifier strings available to the receiver. (read-only)[`var selectedKeyboardInputSource: NSTextInputSourceIdentifier?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextinputcontext/selectedkeyboardinputsource)The identifier string for the selected keyboard text input source.[`class func localizedName(forInputSource: NSTextInputSourceIdentifier) -> String?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextinputcontext/localizedname(forinputsource:))Returns the display name for the given text input source identifier.
